bushake kandi ku buryo butaziguye.
Punishment:
Iyo abihamijwe n’urukiko, 
ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’iminsi 
cumi n’itanu (15) ariko kitarenze amezi 
abiri (2); ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u 
Rwanda atari munsi y’ibihumbi ijana 
(100.000 FRW) ariko atarenze ibihumbi 
magana abiri (200.000 FRW); imirimo 
y’inyungu rusange mu gihe kitarenze iminsi 
cumi n’itanu  (15) cyangwa kimwe gusa 
muri ibyo bihano.

Offence-Name:
Ikurikirana ry’ibyaha 
bibangamira imibereho bwite y’abantu
Description of Act:
Ibyaha bivugwa muri uyu mutwe 
ntibishobora gukurikiranwa bidasabwe 
n’uwahemukiwe, umuhagarariye mu buryo bwemewe  cyangwa umufiteho uburenganzira n’amategeko
Gutwara ikintu cy’undi atabiherewe uburenganzira, agamije kukigira icye cyangwa kugikoresha
Punishment:
Iyo abihamijwe n’urukiko, 
ahanishwa Igifungo cyitari mwaka 1 ariko kitarenze 2 imyaka; Ihazabu: 1,000,000–2,000,000 FRW; Imirimo y’inyungu rusange: amezi 6 cyangwa kimwe muri ibyo

Description of Act: Kwiba witwaje intwaro ishobora kwica cyangwa gukomeretsa
Punishment: Igifungo: 10–15 imyaka; Ihazabu: 5,000,000–7,000,000 FRW

Description of Act: Kwiba hagati ya saa 6:00 z’umugoroba na saa 6:00 z’igitondo
Punishment: Igihano cyikuba kabiri: Igifungo: 2–4 imyaka; Ihazabu: 2,000,000–4,000,000 FRW

Description of Act: Kwiba ukoresheje imbaraga cyangwa ibikangisho
Punishment: Igifungo: 5–7 imyaka; Ihazabu: 3,000,000–5,000,000 FRW

Offence-Name: Kwiba ikinyabiziga kigamije kukijyana mu kindi gihugu
Description of Act: Kwiba ikinyabiziga gifite moteri agamije kukijyana mu kindi gihugu
Punishment: Igifungo: 5–7 imyaka; Ihazabu: 5,000,000–10,000,000 FRW

Description of Act: Kwihesha umutungo w’undi mu buryo bw’uburiganya
Punishment: Igifungo: 2–3 imyaka; Ihazabu: 3,000,000–5,000,000 FRW

Description of Act: Kwaka ikintu uzi neza ko utazishyura
Punishment: Igifungo: iminsi 15–amezi 2; Ihazabu: 100,000–200,000 FRW; Imirimo y’inyungu rusange: iminsi 15 cyangwa kimwe muri ibyo

Offence-Name: Kugumana ku bw’uburiganya ikintu cy’undi cyatoraguwe
Description of Act: Kugumana cyangwa guha abandi ikintu cy’undi wabonye ku buryo bumugwiririye, ku bw’uburiganya
Punishment: Igifungo: 6 amezi–2 imyaka; Ihazabu: 50,000–300,000 FRW

Description of Act: Kwigana cyangwa guhindura imfunguzo mu buryo bw’uburiganya
Punishment: Igifungo: 6 amezi–1 mwaka; Ihazabu: 500,000–1,000,000 FRW

Offence-Name: Kugurisha ikintu cy’undi cyangwa kugitangaho ingwate
Description of Act: Kugurisha cyangwa gutangaho ingwate ikintu uzi ko atari icyawe
Punishment: Igifungo: 1–2 imyaka; Ihazabu: 500,000–1,000,000 FRW

Description of Act: Kurigisa cyangwa kwangiza ibitanzweho ingwate
Punishment: Igifungo: 1–2 imyaka; Ihazabu: 1,000,000–2,000,000 FRW

Description of Act: Gukoresha nabi ikintu cyahawe cyangwa yakirindishijwe, akacyigarurira cyangwa akagitagaguza
Punishment: Igifungo: 3–5 imyaka; Ihazabu: 500,000–1,000,000 FRW

Description of Act: Gukora kimwe mu bikorwa 5 bigamije kurimbura igice cyangwa abantu bose b'itsinda runaka
Punishment: uhamwe niki cyaha ahanishwa Igifungo cya burundu kidashobora kugabanywa

Offence-Name: Icyaha cyo Gucura umugambi wa Jenoside
Description of Act: Gucura umugambi wo gukora Jenoside
Punishment: Uhamwe niki cyaha ahanisha Igifungo cya burundu

Description of Act: Gushyira mu bikorwa imyiteguro ya Jenoside
Punishment: Uhamwe niki cyaha ahanisha Igifungo cya burundu

Description of Act: Gushishikariza abantu gukora Jenoside ku buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose
Punishment: uhamwe niki cyaha ahanishwa igifungo cya burundu.

Description of Act: Kugerageza gukora Jenoside itaragerwaho
Punishment: uhamwe niki cyaha ahanishwa igifungo cya burundu.

Description of Act: Kuba mu itsinda cyangwa gufasha mu bikorwa bya Jenoside
Punishment: uhamwe niki cyaha ahanishwa igifungo cya burundu.

Offence-Name: Icyaha cyibasiye inyokomuntu: kwica, kurimbura, ubucakara, gukubita/torture, gusambanya ku gahato, kurigisa, ibikorwa birenze kamere muntu
Description of Act: Ibyaha bikorwa ku baturage batari abasirikare, bigaragaramo ubugome
Punishment: uhamwe na kimwe muri ibi byaha ahanishwa igifungo cya burundu.

Offence-Name: Icyaha cyibasiye inyokomuntu: gutwara bunyago, gufunga binyuranyije n’amategeko, gutoteza cyangwa ivangura rishingiye ku ruhu
Description of Act: Ibyaha bikorerwa abaturage batari abasirikare, ariko bitarimo ubwicanyi cyangwa ihohotera rikabije
Punishment: uhamwe nakimwe muri ibi byaha ahanishwa Igifungo kitarenze imyaka 25

Offence-Name: Icyaha cyibasiye inyokomuntu bikozwe biherekejwe n’agashinyaguro
Description of Act: Iyo ibikorwa bivugwa hejuru byakozwe bifite agashinyaguro
Punishment: uhamwe niki cyaha ahanishwa igifungo cya burundu.
